titleStmt.title: Killing is murder: or, An answer to a treasonous pamphlet entituled, Killing is no murder.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joseph Moor, and are to be sold by the several booksellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: A reply to "Killing no murder" by Silius Titus and Edward Sexby.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
